title: kaTradin payan enna
sahitya:
kaTradin payan enna manamE adai karuttuDanUnriyE ArAindAyA


anupallavi

  paTruDan anbuDan paN pugazh perugiDa payan tara paNigal palavE seivAi


caraNam    pirar manam puNpaDa pizhai seyyAmal bhEdamum kATTi pirivu seyyAmal
aram enum iraiyAm onrum enavE Anavam nIngi arindE naDappAi
